content: Lambrew can be found in Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge. It is actually right next to where you spawn at the beginning of the chapter (or behind the Sandgate Village - Village Entrance Shrine if you have already reached it). From the spot where you start the chapter, look on your right to find a hill. Head up this hill to find the Lambrew sitting at the top.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Lambrew.md', within the main section titled 'Lambrew', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Lambrew location'.
The content is as follows:
Lambrew can be found in Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge. It is actually right next to where you spawn at the beginning of the chapter (or behind the Sandgate Village - Village Entrance Shrine if you have already reached it). From the spot where you start the chapter, look on your right to find a hill. Head up this hill to find the Lambrew sitting at the top.
